00001 /* ---------------------------------
00002  File: Collision_Handler.h
00003  Author: Johan Nordström and Sebastian Thörn
00004  Updated: 2008-12-06
00005  Description:
00006  All collisions in the game is handled inside here and is
00007  called from our Game Engine (Snake_Engine).
00008  If a collision occurs the method returns true (>0).
00009 ------------------------------------ */
